programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Husband Has a Gambling Addiction
programme.desc: Shawntia has over $13,000 worth of debt because of her husband, Ian’s gambling obsession!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Our Entire Friendship Is A Lie/ Unlock The Phone: You Got Caught!
programme.desc: Victoria is here to set the record straight with Asia. She blames Victoria for the demise of her relationship.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom, Why? / Unlock The Phone: Stop Cheating
programme.desc: Kwane needs help her with her mommy issues. She says her mother dealt in drugs, alcohol, and sex work.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Did My Mom Trade Me for Drugs? Part 2
programme.desc: A DNA mystery that has loomed over Lex’s head for far too long gets answered today!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Cousin Made Me Lose My Baby; Unlock the Phone: Do You Have a Secret, Pregnant Girlfriend?
programme.desc: Tamera's boyfriend is a serial cheater, and she thinks her twin, Tia, is meddlesome and controlling; at age 18, Jarako learned that Akail was his father, but after spending time together, Akail wants to hit pause on things until he gets confirmation.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Deathbed Confession About My Father; Update: Parenting Struggles & My 16-Year-Old Pregnant Niece; Update: DNA: My Dad Is Not Your Dad
programme.desc: Lakresha says Dwight may be her biological father; revisiting Barbara, who was desperate to help her reckless 16-year-old niece Ayonna; revisiting Quitiza, who was trying to determine if Keisha was her biological sister.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Are The 2 Kids I'm Raising Really Mine?
programme.desc: On Karamo, Rodney has been a doting father to Danise’s two children from the moment she was pregnant. Now he’s questioning the paternity of both children. Does Rodney have good reason to be skeptical? Find out when Karamo unlocks this DNA mystery!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I’ll Unlock My Phone To Prove My Innocence
programme.desc: Brianna wants to work things out after catching her boyfriend Taylor in bed with another woman!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone: We’ve Been Back Together for 17 Days / Unlock My Phone and Kiss My Feet
programme.desc: Naz wants her girlfriend Ari to decide if she wants to be with men or her!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: DNA: Step Up for Your Son
programme.desc: Derisha confronts her son’s father, who wants a DNA test before accepting his paternal responsibility.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Cheating Caught on Tape; Mom, Leave Your Toxic Marriage
programme.desc: A silly text message sent two years ago has Felicia and Ray's 13-year marriage on the verge of divorce; Gina says her husband, John, watches her every move and constantly accuses her of cheating on him.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Just A Kid... I'll Prove I'm Not Your Baby's Dad!
programme.desc: Christina wants to know if Danny or his best friend Kyle is her child’s father! Then, Duck has paternity doubts because he says after falling asleep, he woke up with Brittany and another man getting hot and heavy! What will the DNA results reveal?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: These 3 Women Will Find Out Today...That's Not My Baby!
programme.desc: Today on MAURY, LaShonda slept with her high school sweetheart Andrew, but doesn’t know if her baby is his or Dale’s. Plus, Jacqueline wants to know if her sister Sherilyn’s baby is her fiancé Chris’s!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Before the Wedding…I Have 3 Shocking Sex Secrets!
programme.desc: Markia has brought her boyfriend Mike all the way to The MAURY Show because she says she has to reveal 3 shocking secrets before they can be married. But, when the secrets are revealed, will there be a wedding at all?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Cheated With Our Best Friend
programme.desc: Candy is furious because DT dumped her to start dating her own cousin. But if that wasn't enough, now DT's denying both of Candy's kids! Candy says that when the paternity results are revealed they will reveal that he is the father of her children.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Slept With 100 Men ... Will I Ever Find My Baby's Dad?
programme.desc: Angela is back to test a sixth man, Corey. Next, Carla needs help with her baby and wants Terranius to step up and accept his responsibility for his child. Plus, Quita is here to confront her ex-boyfriend Cedric for denying her son.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: You Cheat and Lie ... I'll Prove Your Babies Aren't Mine!
programme.desc: These guests are desperate to end the search for their baby's fathers. But these denying dads swear that they're not the right guys. But Maury's got the results that you crave and the truth to set these women free.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Does Charles Have 12 Kids? The Results Are In!
programme.desc: On today's Maury ... Who's the father? Who's not? Those are the questions that will be answered. These women are sick and tired of these denying dads and they're ready to find out the truth once and for all. But these men swear they're being lied to and that they're not the real fathers of these children. Who's right? Who's lying? We'll find out on today's MAURY!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Cheated With Your Dad…Is He My Baby's Father?
programme.desc: Don and his wife were happy to find their son isn't the father, but they’re back because Don might be!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Secretly Cheated...Your Sister's Baby May Be Mine!
programme.desc: Tiffany swears that Doug is the father of her baby. But Doug swears there are literally hundreds of other potential fathers . Then, Amanda and Derrik's relationship started as a fling. But now it's ending with a DNA Test.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: DNA Will Prove…You Fathered My 3 Kids!
programme.desc: Monique and Daron are at odds over the paternity of their 2 daughters. Is Daron’s new girlfriend the reason for denying the girls? Or is Monique a cheater? Then, grandma Rachel returns to accuse her son’s girlfriend of cheating!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Maury Spring Break ... Shocking DNA Drama
programme.desc: Today, we're taking a look at some outrageous paternity stories from the beautiful beaches of Hollywood, Florida! We're throwing a beach party, MAURY style . But It's going to be beach blanket bedlam with MAURY as your host.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: No One Steals from Charles Toes
programme.desc: Charles Toes says the defendant, his former girlfriend took his debit card and went on a wild shopping spree without his permission or authorization. Did the defendant think she could steal from him and think he wouldn't notice? Please. He is Charlie Toes. And no one steals from Charlie Toes.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Cake Catastrophe
programme.desc: Marva Utley sues Ed’s bakery for $1,500 after receiving a red velvet cake instead of the rum cake she ordered for her daughter's birthday. Ed claims it was a mix-up by a new employee and offered a refund, but Marva says the mistake ruined the party.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Exes at War
programme.desc: Samantha sues her ex, Matthew, for $500 or the return of their dog, Daisy, claiming he's aggressive and unfit to care for her. Matthew counters, insisting Daisy is his since he saved her from the pound.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Suing a Sister-in-Law
programme.desc: Peter Persaud sues his sister-in-law Sharon Chee for $824.59, claiming she owes him for household items he bought for her apartment. Sharon argues she already paid for some items, rejected the bed, and isn't liable for unwanted items.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Your Teenagers Trashed My House
programme.desc: Elizabeth sues Alexis for $2,162, saying Alexis rented her house for a graduation party and caused major damages, including a broken door. Alexis denies the claims, insists she cleaned up, and accuses Elizabeth of overreacting for money

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Car Catastrophe
programme.desc: Anita is being sued after repossessing a car she believes to be hers, but who does the car really belong to?

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Plus Size Model Confronts Her Online Troll
programme.desc: Shawntel is fed up with her ex-friend Christian fat shaming her on social media! He says it's tough love.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Help My Out of Control 14-Year-Old Sister!
programme.desc: Eric is concerned about his 14-year-old sister and believes she’s headed down a path of self-destruction.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My 16-Year-Old Sister Is Out of Control / My BFF Doesn’t Care about My Trauma
programme.desc: Dionna thinks her younger sister is headed down the wrong path to nowhere! On top of that she's boy crazy.
